there are much much better places for the money.  prices here are 2x more than other 'famous' places in Barcelona.Another reviewer mentioned super salty paella.  yup.  got it, salty as f--k.  seafood on it was bland. i like al dente but this rice was a bit too hard.  my bowels will not be happy later. my kidneys will not appreciate having to work overtime with all that sodium.their plate jamon was 24 euros but not the best.  their pan con tomate was really good though! oh, had to send back 2 plates of clams because there was so much sand they were not edible.  came back with a plate of cockles.  like, 8 cockles.  for 15 euros.   which were good but preparation-wise, nothing special - salt and olive oil.  squeezed lemon on top.  for 15 euros.was thinking about getting dessert too but didn't wanna chance it. i usually don't care about price if the food is good.  but if i'm gonna eat shitty food, don't make me feel doubly bad by eating shit food and grossly overpaying.
